question: On their neck, armpits, boobs. Etc.. my armpits look like 2 shades darker and my neck looks as if it's dirty;( I'm soo disgusted by it!! I scrub the heck out of it but still there. Will this go away after baby arrives? Anyone else on the same boat?
title: Anyone else got dark spots..
